## Worm.setDepthFirstSearchState() method

Sets the depth first search order property of the given session. The chosen index can be gathered using the respective API function.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setDepthFirstSearchState(session: number, state: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  session | number | The Worm session to be targeted. |
|  state | string | The n-th state of the depth first search enumeration. |

**Returns:**

void
